name: perl-datetime

variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

description: DateTime - A date and time object for Perl

dependencies.name: perl
dependencies.description:
Perl 5 is a highly capable, feature-rich programming language with over
27 years of development.

dependencies.name: perl-cpan-meta-check
dependencies.description:
This module verifies if requirements described in a CPAN::Meta object
are present..

dependencies.name: perl-datetime-timezone
dependencies.description: DateTime::TimeZone - Time zone object base class and factory

dependencies.name: perl-dist-checkconflicts
dependencies.description: Declare version conflicts for your dist

dependencies.name: perl-namespace-autoclean
dependencies.description: Namespace::Autoclean - Keep imports out of your namespace

dependencies.name: perl-params-validationcompiler
dependencies.description:
Params::ValidationCompiler - Build an optimized subroutine parameter
validator once, use it forever

dependencies.name: perl-specio
dependencies.description: Type constraints and coercions for Perl .

dependencies.name: perl-test-fatal
dependencies.description: Incredibly simple helpers for testing code with exceptions

dependencies.name: perl-test-warnings
dependencies.description: Test for warnings and the lack of them

dependencies.name: perl-test-without-module
dependencies.description: Test fallback behaviour in absence of modules

dependencies.name: perl-try-tiny
dependencies.description: Minimal try/catch with proper preservation of $@

dependent_to.name: lcov
dependent_to.description:
LCOV is a graphical front-end for GCC's coverage testing tool gcov. It
collects gcov data for multiple source files and creates HTML pages
containing the source code annotated with coverage information. It also
adds overview pages for easy navigation within the file structure. LCOV
supports statement, function and branch coverage measurement.

dependent_to.name: perl-datetime-format-oracle
dependent_to.description: Parse and format Oracle dates and timestamps

dependent_to.name: perl-rose-db
dependent_to.description: A DBI wrapper and abstraction layer.

dependent_to.name: perl-datetime-format-mysql
dependent_to.description: Parse and format MySQL dates and times

dependent_to.name: perl-datetime-format-pg
dependent_to.description: Parse and format PostgreSQL dates and times

dependent_to.name: perl-datetime-format-strptime
dependent_to.description: Parse and format strp and strf time patterns

dependent_to.name: perl-datetime-format-builder
dependent_to.description: Create DateTime parser classes and objects.
